title: New Forest Countryside Luxury near Highcliffe Beach with Daily Breakfast & Resort Credit
description:
Escape the noise with a prestigious stay at an 18th-century country house on England's southern coast. Set on 130 acres of New Forest's countryside and just minutes from the seaside, this five-star Relais & Chateaux property offers the perfect combination of rural charm and coastal splendour paired with high-end facilities.

At the award-winning Chewton Glen Spa, you can reset your natural rhythms with a myriad of bespoke wellness treatments or unwind in the hydrotherapy pool, sauna or steam room. Take advantage of the hotel's sprawling grounds with a game of golf or tennis, before indulging in quintessentially English fine dining at The Dining Room, or garden-to-plate delights at The Kitchen - led by acclaimed chef James Martin.

Should you wish to venture further afield, take a stroll to the New Forest National Park, offering woodland, wildlife and tranquility, or spend a day exploring the pristine shores and rugged cliffs of Highcliffe Beach and beyond.
offer_address: Christchurch Road, New Milton BH25 6QS, United Kingdom
